metadata.title: CVE-2019-13602 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An Integer Underflow in MP4_EIA608_Convert() in modules/demux/mp4/mp4.c inVideoLAN VLC media player through 3.0.7.1 allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow and crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted .mp4 file.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
